section.p: You end up floating in the harbour, your throat cut, just another victim. You are dead. Cross off the possessions listed on your Adventure Sheet.

p.if: If you have a resurrection arranged then you can turn to the entry marked for it.
p.else: If you have no resurrection then it really is the end; you should delete all ticks and codewords in all your Fabled Lands books and then start again (at 1 in any book in the series) with a new character.
